title: Contemporary and Innovative Inner-City Brussels Stay
description: Immerse yourself with a contemporary stay at voco Brussels City North, an IHG Hotel, where style meets technology - complete with a luggage robot to help you to your room. Nestled in the heart of Belgium's vibrant capital, the hotel is a stone's throw from the city's iconic landmarks, including the Grand Place and Atomium. Savor the culinary delights of nearby restaurants, or jumpstart your morning with a freshly baked breakfast onsite.
location_description: voco Brussels City North, an IHG Hotel
